resources.string: Can you name the answers to the following Friends questions?
What is the name of Rachel\'s ex maid of honor who married her ex fiance?
Which instrument did ross play in high school?
What are the names of Rachel\'s sisters?
What is the name of Phoebe\'s brother?
What is the name of Ross\'s dirty girlfriend hamster?
What is the job of Phoebe\'s ex husband?
What is the name of the mountain Joey uses in his hiking story?
What are the names of Monica\'s and Ross\'s parents?
What is the name of Phoebe\'s overly enthusiastic boyfriend?
What are the names of Joey\'s sisters?
